files.name: Cellpose CPU (Windows)
files.description: Installs Cellpose for Windows. Please note that this version of Cellpose is not GPU-accelerated.

files.name: Cellpose GPU (Windows)
files.description: Installs Cellpose for Windows. This version is based on Torch version 1.10.2 and utilizes CUDA for GPU acceleration.

files.name: Cellpose CPU (Linux)
files.description: Installs Cellpose for Linux. Please note that this version of Cellpose is not GPU-accelerated. The package was generated on Ubuntu 22.04.

files.name: Cellpose GPU (Linux)
files.description: Installs Cellpose for Linux. This version is based on Torch version 1.10.2 and utilizes CUDA for GPU acceleration.

files.name: Cellpose CPU (macOS, Intel)
files.description: Installs Cellpose for macOS. Please note that this version of Cellpose is not GPU-accelerated. The package was generated on macOS 12.4 (Intel).
